text: Adventureland is a 2009 American romantic comedy-drama movie. It is set in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania in summer 1987. It was produced by Sidney Kimmel, Anne Carey and Ted Hope. It was written and directed by Greg Mottola. Adventureland was released on April 3, 2009 in North America. The movie received positive reviews with a 88% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 76 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == * Jesse Eisenberg as James Brennan * Kristen Stewart as Emily "Em" Lewin * Ryan Reynolds as Mike Connell * Martin Starr as Joel * Matt Bush as Tommy Frigo * Margarita Levieva as Lisa P. * Bill Hader as Bobby * Kristen Wiig as Paulette * Mary Birdsong-Covey as Francy * Josh Pais as Mr. Lewin * Jack Gilpin as Mr. Brennan * Wendie Malick as Mrs. Brennan == Other websites == *Adventureland's official website * * Category:2009 comedy- drama movies Category:2009 romantic comedy movies Category:2009 romantic drama movies Category:2000s teen comedy movies Category:2000s teen drama movies Category:2000s teen romance movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Pennsylvania Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Pittsburgh in fiction
title: Adventureland (movie)
